string.text: Find fuel tank for Fanatic
Fanatic asked to find him a canister of 95th gasoline.

Need a job, right? Work is always there. Can you find me a full canister of 95th gasoline? For furnaces, yes, all sorts of generators ... There are places in the zone where you can find it, because nobody needs it here.

Also I can advise to look in the Dark Valley, at the gas station. Only there the military are hanging around, be careful, and it’s not a fact that there is fuel there, the information is not verified by anyone. How do you find - bring it me, I do not urgently, I have instructed others the same.
Already got it? Give it here. It's heavy, mother ... Hold that:
Find Fuel for Fanatic
Fanatic asked him to find a kerosene canister.

We periodically need to replenish stocks of fuel. Can you find me a full can of kerosene? For the needs of the camp. There are places in the zone where you can find them, because nobody needs it here.

I don't know where exactly you can find one, but I think it's worth fumbling in the garages for something. If you find, one drag it here, i'm not in a hurry, I have instructed the same to many people. Good luck searching.
So, today it means we will have a barbecue ... Keep your reward:
Meet Polymer
The next destination is the mechanic Polymer.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
A friend of mine sent me message, he needed help, i'll see him.
Good luck, stalker.
Find a %s for Polymer
Polymer screwed up when repairing the trunk. We need to find him a replacement for a %s. Execution time - 6 days.
Stalker, I desperately need your help. The local authority gave me a task to repair his barrel, but I accidentally damaged it, and in such conditions I cannot recover it. Can you find a replacement?
So, specifically, I need a %s. Also, bear in mind that he will come for it in 6 days, don't loose time. I do not have a lot of money, but I can thank you.
Oh, great! Thanks, you saved my ass. Here, for your efforts:
Destroy the mutant swarm
Polymer asked to eliminate the pack of mutants annoying him. Execution time - 1 day.

Stalker, you are not particularly busy with anything? My business is interrupted by these damn mutants, blocking the way here. I'm not very good at shooting, could you kill them for me? I need to get rid of them as soon as possible, I give you a day.
Thank. Here is your reward, as I promised:
Postman
Polymer asked me to deliver the package to another stalker. The execution time is one day.

You need to be a mailman, that's the kind of work you can do. So... You take this, and you give it to a stalker, I'll put a tag on your PDA. If you're late or something happens to the package, you'll have to charge yourself.
Not bad, you did it fast. Here you go:
Borrower
Polymer needs the money this stalker owed him. It's a 24-hour runtime.

There is one delicate matter... Not that we're gangsters, but we're gonna have to beat somebody out of money. More specifically, a stalker owes me one, and he's clearly not going to pay me back. We need to talk to him, and that doesn't mean we have to kill him.
Well, well, well... I think it's the full amount, here. It's your share:
See Lumberjack
I need to look for Lumberjack in the Dark Valley.
Get the next task
Get the next task
You know, we've been waiting for you, and we've given another stalker your assignment. But you can look for work with others.
Have a good road.
Parcel
Pick up the package left by some stalker for Lumberjack.

I got some important documents for me, the courier left them, I think that it's in a contractual place and you need to pick them up. See that there is no tail behind you, if you notice it, eliminate it. The case is pretty serious. In time, I do not limit you, but if these pieces of paper are not with me, you will have problems.
Well done, good work means a good reward:
Hunting
Get %s. Execution time - 2 days.

Recently, one stalker came in and bought half of the mutant meat reserves. He didn't answered my questions, well, to hell with him. But there is nothing to trade. Would you like to go hunting? Just hurry so that after two days everything is here.
Well, your pay:
Messenger
Lumberjack asked me to deliver this package to another stalker. The time of execution is 24 hours.

I'll be brief: I give you the cargo, you take it to the stalker. If something happens to the cargo, or you don't make it in time, you answer with your head. You'll have plenty of day to make it. You'll take the payment from me.
Not bad, you did it fast. Here you go:
Collector
Lumberjack needs the money that that stalker owed him. It's a 24-hour runtime.
I hope you're not afraid of some dirty work. We need to deal with one of my debtors, you don't have to kill him, of course. I'll expect you with the money in exactly 24 hours. Come on.
Well, well... I think it's the full amount. Your share:
Meet with Barman
I need to go to the bar and talk with the owner.
Get the next job
Go with Barman for further instructions.
You're quick, of course. Look, another stalker's already doing your job, but I have an idea. I know someone who probably needs your help.
Don't worry.
Destroy the mutant lair
There was found a cluster of mutants that pose a danger to local stalkers in this place. You need to clear the area and return for the award.
You're not into hunting? The other day, around one important point, the mutants set up a lair, and it would be nice if someone got rid of them. Will you take it?
Well done. Now it will get a little calmer here, thanks, stalker. Keep the money:
Destroy the bandit camp
It is necessary to clean the area from the bandits. Execution time - 2 days.

We have big problems with bandits in the area. These bastards don't leave us alone: they rob, blackmail, and kidnap our people. They blocked most of the safe routes, you just need to get rid of them! I'll give you two days for everything. Will you help?
Damn, thanks! Now they will not turn up for us for a long time! Keep your reward:
Game Hunting
%s - get and bring it to the Bartman. Execution time - 3 days.
If you shoot well and are not afraid of mutants, I have a job for you. Interested in?

Interruptions in delivery, there's lot of visitors... But supplies are needed. Some people from time to time bring me one or two mutant carcasses, but lately nobody wants to hunt something. So, if you are not busy, and you are interested in this work, be kind, do not refuse. %s would be very useful right now. The main thing to remember: adrenaline, released due to excessive excitement of the animal makes the meat tough. And the less blood at the time of the murder, the tastier the meat. So shoot carefully, okay? I'll give you a deadline of 3 days.
Great, you're still a good hunter. Here is your reward:
Go with Magpie
The dealer from the flea market wants a conversation with me.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
Well, I do not need help anymore, go here, to him.
Goodbye, stalker.
Find %s for Magpie
Magpie asked to find this for him.
Here at the junk market we provide half of the areas with spare parts, materials and other things. I need something, and I am sure that you can guess why. Will you find it?
So, I need %s. If you find it, bring it to me. I have some money, but I can thank you.
Well, keep your reward:
%s - supplies for Magpies
%s is what they need. Execution time - 3 days.
It would seem that there is everything in the flea market, but you cannot find canned food in a pile of garbage. We need supplies. Can you provide?
%s - get it. Do not pull until we died of hunger here, I give you three days.
Thank you, keep the reward:
Go with Tihiy
This secretive person has a deal for me.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
I can't wait for the right people to come and ask me for contracts. You're late. But as a colleague, I can offer to ask this man for a job.
Goodbye, stalker.
Contract
I Need to eliminate this target. Execution time - 2 days.

It looks like, who can bother me here? After all, my person is shrouded in darkness, everything is fine, right? However, there are some individuals who annoy me that I would like to see dead soon. You will have two days before he goes somewhere.
Good. Here's the promised reward:
Go with Suitcase
He most likely has some business for me.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
Come on, we thought you were dead a long time ago, it wasn't that long. Look, we don't have a job anymore, but you can ask others.
See you later.
Murder
Need to eliminate this objective. Execution time - 2 days.

We always have a lot of contracts for the next head. Recently, a rather interesting person addressed us and the goal is no less interesting, so I would like this contract to be done by you. There is not much time left on the contract, more precisely, 2 days, but I am sure that you will manage to do it.
Perfect. Here is the reward:
Important documents
I was assigned to get the documents from the X8 laboratory.

We have recently stumbled a big and dangerous job. Nobody wants to take it, but I'm sure you can handle it. We need to get some documents from the laboratory X8. I will mark you the coordinates. If you find them, bring them to me.
Excellent. Here is the reward:
Visit Slicer
Slicer wants me to go to him.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
Yeah, bro, you're the only one who's sent. Your contract's already done, ask someone else.
See you!
Important parcel
I was instructed to deliver the package. Execution time - 12 hours.
I urgently need a courier. You must pick up the package from the cache and deliver it to me. I give you everything for 12 hours, no more.
Well done. Here is the reward:
Destroy the camp
I need to clear this camp. Execution time - 1 day.
There's a task. There's a couple of stalkers around here, they need to be quickly and professionally removed. I give you a day to perform.
Well done. Here is the reward:
Go with Max
There is always enough work on the barrier, and I need to help Max.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
Dude, you gotta speed up or you're gonna freeze sometime. There's no assignment for you anymore, but you can talk to him about the job.
Easy road to you.
Patrol areas
Patrol the area around the Freedom Base.
Man, you know, because of the barrier, someone constantly rushes at us, but they also creep up behind you. Need you to patrol around here.
Oh, good. Here, take it:
Protect the base
Protect the base from the enemy assault. Execution time - 1 day.

So Man, our intelligence reported that they were going to storm us for the umpteenth time. It is necessary to protect the base. I gave you the coordinates, intercept them before they are a real threat to us. You have no more than a day.
Great job man. You earned this:
Go to the Gatekeeper
Gatekeeper said that he has a job for me.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
So you were the one who needed the job? Well, you know, you're late. Now look for them from others.
See you.
Eliminate the camp
Gatekeeper ordered the liquidation of the Monolith camp. Execution time - 1 day.

So... We have quite a difficult situation with the Monolith, these animals are very annoying to us. It is necessary to erase one of their camps from the face of the Zone. I give you a day to complete.
Professional work, keep doing it:
Accurate shot
You need to quietly and quickly eliminate the target. Execution time - 2 days.
We received another order for the head of one stalker. Work needs to be done professionally. Before the order expires, two days, this is the maximum that you have. Clear?
Good job - good pay:
Meet Zhurov
You need to see Zhurov for the following instructions.
Get the next task
Need to get the next task.
Fighter, we almost put you on the list of missing people, it took you a long time to get here. In general, the work ended, I can advise you to look for him.
Stay by
Capture territory
It is necessary to clean up and keep this territory. Execution time - 2 days.

So... We have a rather difficult situation with the Monolith, these fanatics are annoying us very much. It is necessary to erase one of their camps from the face of the Zone. I give you no more than two days.
Good job, keep it up:
Meet with the merchant
The local shopkeeper from the Garbage wants to see me.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
Listen, you guys decided to play like that, looking for a job and come to hell knows when? In short, go look for others, smart.
Come on.
Cleaning
It is necessary to remove the mutants for the fella.
Well, there is one thing here. Shitty mutants have already gotten to their livers, we need to pinch them better, here.
Good on you, mate! Here is your reward:
Visit supplier
One of the suppliers of our fighters wants to see me.
Get the next task
Get the next job.
That's all, brother. Go ahead and light your way the light of the Monolith.
Goodbye.
Search the laboratory X-19
It is necessary to fulfill the will of the Most High and find the documents in X-19.

We are not in the best situation on the periphery with the infidels. For the umpteenth time, we again had to turn on the Burner, and the Monolith decided that we needed to retrieve the documents from the laboratory closest to the wrong ones. Set off.
Praise Monolith, the documents are here and you are intact. Take:
Visit supplier
One of the suppliers of our fighters wants to see me.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
That's all, brother. Go ahead and light your way the light of the Monolith.
Goodbye.
Raid the camp
It is necessary to destroy the camp of the infidels. Execution time - 1 day.

The will of the Monolith is for this camp of the infidels to be destroyed. May the Monolith bless you, fight bravely, everyone in this camp must die. And don't make the Almighty wait, don't pull more than a day.
Glory to Monolith, you are intact. Accept these gifts:
Meet Dead
Dead has some business for me.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
You must be joking! Your contract has long been done by another mercenary. Look for a deal from anyone you want now, to my ass.
Stay by
Find %s
Dead asked me to find this artifact. Execution time - 6 days.
There is one order for an artifact, no one wants to take it, so it's for you. You need to find %s. Bear in mind that the contract expires in 6 days - that’s all you have. Set off
Not bad, keep your share:
Meet the shopkeeper
One of our shopkeepers sent a bribe to me, that is to say.
Get the next task
Get the next task.
Well, you fucking joker. Pahan thought you disappeared a long time ago, in short, you can look for a job on other place.
Stay by
%s for the trader
The merchant of bandits from Jupiter asked to find a %s for him. Execution time - 6 days.

Well, blah, we have a business here, everything is clear. Sultan recently ordered an interesting stock, and we need to find it. Do you take on such work? There is nothing to do with it, a trifling matter.
%s - specifically, we need this gun now. Search where you want and get it in any way. Toka must hurry, Pahan gave a period of 6 days.
Well done, here is your part:
End the target
The next target needs to be eliminated. Runtime - 2 days.
Yes, we always have a job to do. I give you the coordinates, you destroy the target in time. Deal?
Well done, keep your money:
%s - bring them to Zhenya "Hatchet"
%s - Zhenya "Hatchet" asked me to collect them for him.
Want to hunt people? I'm telling you how many stripes to rip off, you bring them to me and you get the money. How do you like that?
Well, that's pretty clear, isn't it? %s - collect them for me, and I'll pay you well.
Well done, bro. Hold the money:
%s here. Listen, I need a %s delivery here. Do you want to escort them?
Good.
Stalker, the "package" just left from %s, if you help it to reach me, I would pay well.
This is %s. Are you leaving %s now? I'll be waiting for you.
Thank you for the help in the delivery, hold on - here is your reward.
Thanks.
%s in Squad %s has died at %s
Squad %s created at %s destination is %s for %s.
You did that... If you pass by my shack - come in, let's talk.
Come in, chat. I have some small business coming up...
You went right under the military checkpoint. They only talk with bullets, so be careful there.

Greetings. I am the leader of the Clear Sky group, whose members you contacted on the mainland and which you wanted to get. Listen, you guys, it seems, didn’t get quite there. Come to our base on the swamps.

I'm glad to see you. I am here for the main thing in the groupings with whose members you contacted beyond the perimeter and into which you wanted to get. Come to the base directly to the west, let's talk. You will find me in a large wooden shack, on the first floor.

Man, you wandered right into the swamp. If you don't want to disappear here, then go to our village on the Cordon. Or you can go with the bogs at the base, turn over, it's right in the west. It's your business.
Fighter, wake up, stop sleeping. You seem to be here alone, you slept through everything. Let's run to the base, there's something.
Come on, rub your eyes, enough to sleep in the barracks. Come to me, the work has appeared. You seemed to be looking for it.
Come on, let's talk!
Howdy, stalker! They took you straight to the hollow, look. Come tto he camp if you want.

Whoa, new people! The guys dropped you off really far. Look, it's like you've got cancer in Moscow, so you can go through the car park at Meadow. Come see me sometime, our base is in Dark Valley at the factory.
Howdy fella! Brought you brothers as it should, not far. Move first to the north, then to the west and again to the north all the way, there you will find our base in the factory. Look at me later.

Dude, where are you? Basically that you have to go east. In short, to get somehow to our base in the Dark Valley. In the swamps should be boys on the northwest shack or on the farm. There is also a camp at the Cordon car park.
Hey, you were looking for a job? Go over to me, grind.
Yo, fuck me. Not hobbled yet? In short, the job appeared. Look, if there is a hunt.
Brother, work has appeared. If you want, come in, grind.
Fighter, rise! The job that you were looking for appeared. Come to me and we'll discuss the details.
How well's protected there? Soon there'll be a new shift. Come to me, a job appeared, and you needed it.
Man, are you alive there? You were looking for a job, and I recently found one. Look, let's talk on this.
Hi, Man. Soon there is a shift on the barrier, you can come to me, the job you were looking for appeared.
Come on, get up! Sleeping a lot is bad. You asked me about the job. Come and talk about this.
Good morning. You seem to be looking for a job. You can look in your free time, we'll talk.
Colleague, I have a conversation with you about the job you were looking for.
Greetings. I understand that you are far and difficult to get to me, but the work you were looking for came.
Good morning. When there is time, then look to me, I have a job that you were looking for.
Let's go to the base in Dead City, there are free orders.
Need work? Come on, orders are free.
Woke up? It is time to fulfill the will of the Monolith, come for instructions.
%c[default], I have new coordinates, come.
Well, what did you find? %c[255,255,160,0]
%c[default], if you can’t find it come back, they’ve probably already found it.
%c[default], This is Fanatic. Have you changed your mind? If everything is in place, come. I have new coordinates.
%c[default], This is George, I have a job for you, come and think.
%c[default], This is George, is it done?
%c[default], This is George, I have a deal with you, come near.
%c[default], I have news about your detector, come on.
%c[255,255,160,0]Maybe to drink with someone?
Reminder:
Execution time for task «
» half expired.
» is about to expire.
» has run out of time!
